text: Alexandre Hauw (born 22 January 1982 in Bourgoin-Jallieu, Isère) is a French retired footballer who played as a midfielder. ==External links== * * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bourgoin- Jallieu Category:Sportspeople from Isère Category:French footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Championnat National 2 players Category:Olympique Lyonnais players Category:FC Rouen players Category:Clermont Foot players Category:FC Gueugnon players Category:Monts d'Or Azergues Foot players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Associação Naval 1º de Maio players Category:G.D.
